Nightshift transforms into black panther mode and tries to keep low to the =
ground, skulking through the snow like a skilled hunter.

" Okay Polarclaw,=
 all I need is a back door entrance and I can do the rest.  That includes c=
utt'n the motion sensors as well as disarming the the tower.  It's better i=
f I go in alone.  That way I can get in there and clear the way for you guy=
s."

Don't be envious of what you don't have, be grateful for things you al=
ready posses.  Nothing is worth more than family and friends.

On Nov 14, 2=
011, at 5:08 AM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>=

> >
> > Nightshift keeps his supplies minimal and keeps only what is essen=
tial for
> > the mission. Once doing that he slips back into beast mode as =
he too,
> > prepares to go topside.
> >
> > " I'm tell'n ya Polarclaw, that=
 tower's been hacked and whoever the hacker
> > is, is gonna wish they mind=
ed their own business when we get through with
> > 'em."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> PO=
LAR CLAW nodded, "You might be right kid, but we won't know for
> sure." Hi=
s voice was gruff but not unkind as he climbed up out of the
> shuttle and =
onto the snow shifting into his beastmode - a polar bear.
> 
> WOLFGANG shi=
fted into his wolf mode as RAMULUS became an Ibex. "Piece
> of cake." WOLFG=
ANG said with his usual exuberance.
> 
> "Prowl, give us some aerial recon.=
" POLAR CLAW said as he looked at
> the mountains ahead of them.
> 
> PROWL=
 nodded as he became a transmetal owl and leaped into the air
> flying upwa=
rds.
> 
> "The rest of you, let's move." POLAR CLAW's voice was that of a
>=
 leader, gruff. confident and commander.
> 
> Up above, in the mountains, a=
 hundred or so feet above the group there
> was a small pass that would all=
ow them through.
> 
> OOC: Airly, go ahead and insert Perceptor if you want=
 him in here with
> this group. if not he can be at the Ark.
> 
> - Preston=

> 

--Apple-Mail-F5E44A9A-1A06-40F7-9B7F-C2F28F2534D6

> Nightshift keeps h=
is supplies minimal and keeps only what is essential for<br>
> the missi=
on.  Once doing that he slips back into beast mode as he too,<br>

ares to go topside.<br>

> " I'm tell'n ya Polarclaw, that tower=
's been hacked and whoever the hacker<br>

d their own business when we get through with<br>

<br>
<N=
EW><br>
<br>
POLAR CLAW nodded, "You might be right kid, but we won't kn=
ow for<br>
sure." His voice was gruff but not unkind as he climbed up out o=
f the<br>
shuttle and onto the snow shifting into his beastmode - a polar b=
ear.<br>
<br>
WOLFGANG shifted into his wolf mode as RAMULUS became an Ibex=
. "Piece<br>
of cake." WOLFGANG said with his usual exuberance.<br>
<br>
"P=
rowl, give us some aerial recon." POLAR CLAW said as he looked at<br>
the m=
ountains ahead of them.<br>
<br>
PROWL nodded as he became a transmetal owl=
 and leaped into the air<br>
flying upwards.<br>
<br>
"The rest of you, let=
's move." POLAR CLAW's voice was that of a<br>
leader, gruff. confident and=
 commander.<br>
<br>
Up above, in the mountains, a hundred or so feet above=
 the group there<br>
was a small pass that would allow them through.<br>

r>
